title: Ep 247: & Then We Had Secks (Ft. JRod and Kristen )
itunes:title: Ep 247: & Then We Had Secks (Ft. JRod and Kristen )
description:
This week the duo is joined the couple and hosts of the “And Then We Had Sex” Podcast, Kristen and JRod. Married 6 years, we open the conversation with some relationship questions to get an idea of the two. Vanilla Sh-t this week, a woman says that she lets her mother and sister have sex with her husband. We share role playing ideas out of the norm for the Whorederve before we dig into the idea of “over-sharing” with your partner. Can sharing your sexual past have a negative effect on your current relationship? Should things be shared with your partners or should some things be kept to yourself?


Check out this week’s guest on social media

Kristen Sivills @Kristensivills

JRod @jtalk100

Follow their podcast page on IG @andthenwehadsex and listen to their podcast every week


Get your tickets NOW! WHOREible Decisions is back on the road! Get your tickets at Whorehive.com

Friday 12/17 Atlanta


Follow the hosts on social media Weezy @Weezywtf & Mandii B @Fullcourtpumps and follow the Whoreible Decisions pages

Instagram @whoreible_decisions

Don't forget to tag #whoreibledecisions or @ us to let us know what you think of this week's episode!
